bug_fixes.impact: Simplified the codebase to avoid confusion and potential issues related to migrations.

bug_fixes.whats_new: Decreased the number of concurrent runs to 50.
bug_fixes.impact: This change helps improve system stability by limiting resource usage during peak times.

bug_fixes.whats_new: Removed unnecessary prefix from published images.
bug_fixes.impact: This cleanup will lead to easier management of images and reduce any ambiguity in their naming.

tests.whats_new: Run ClickHouse tests against ClickHouse Cloud.
tests.impact: Ensures that all functionalities work correctly with the cloud version, better reliability for users.

documentation.whats_new: Updated Docker publish use to a simpler versioning scheme.
documentation.impact: Using the Git tag name as the Docker tag makes deployments easier and more reliable.

others.whats_new: Bumped version requirements for dependencies to keep them up-to-date.
others.impact: Maintaining updated dependencies ensures that the software uses the latest features and security patches.
